description:
Eagle Squadron is a top-down shooter where the goal is to go through 10 levels with 14 enemy types (ranging from from weak to semi bosses). The player will also face bosses during their journey through the five environments with changing palettes to have day/night appearances. The player may use one of the three available aircraft: an old biplane, an F-16, or an attack helicopter (locked at the beginning of the game) to destroy enemy troops.

Use 4, 8, 6, 2 or the DPad to move the fire button allowing to toggle between automatic shoot and no shoot. Press * to throw a powerful bomb that will destroy all on screen enemies.

sample_screenshots.caption: The starting point of the game is in the desert. Those enemies are quick but weak, beware not to hurt them.
A raid over Paris? The town seems almost destroyed. You can use bombs to kill all on screen enemies in one action.
Still in the desert. Now you are facing a semi boss. Avoid his powerfull shots, you would suffer very quickly.
Game splashscreen

title: Eagle Squadron

description: Help the small goblins to rescue Santa Claus who has been poisoned by a malefic substance. Not he wants to destroy all the gifts he prepared for the Xmas night and decided to send spiders and wolves all over the world. Christmas Tales is a side view scrolling platform game taking place in the white snow lands where Santa Claus is leaving. You will play in 12 levels of gameplay with 3 different graphic environment plus 3 bosses levels. Bonuses are collectible all through the game and will provide you snow balls you will be able to throw to kill enemies. Use 4 and 6 (Dpad left and right) to move, 2 (DPad up) to jump, 8 (or DPad down) to crouch and 5 to throw a snow ball.

sample_screenshots.caption: The last levels take place in the house of Santa Claus himself. You will have to rescue him from the poison he is suffering.
The 1st level starts in the deep snow lands where Santa Claus lives. Warning, Yetis may not be happy to see you.
Game splashscreen
The safer here is to throw a snowball at the face of this cursed star. Warning you have a limited number of snowballs. Use them correctly.
The 2nd environment will be a dark forest with Spiders and wolves.

title: Christmas Tales

description: This game is a 2D side view landing game. The tinies are little hair balls with two big eyes falling from the sky. Their life is pretty short since their only destiny is to crash on the floor. If they don't want to die, they have only one solution, fart in order to reduce their falling speed and land on a smart zone where nothing can hurt them. Help the tinies to navigate in this dangerous world where everything can kill them. Press the fire button to fart and up left and right to have the tiny rotate on itself.

sample_screenshots.caption: Then finally a big forest. The levels can be very large...
Rules are clearly presented inside the game, like a small tutorial in 3 steps.
You will face 3 different environments. A cave first, then Egyptian landscape...
Fart to stop the fall and to go up. Do not touch the floor.
Game main menu

title: Tinies Farter

description: Crazy Cobra 2 is a Nokia snake clone for ExEn technology. It is a top view very simple game where the goal is to eat pills. But this game is much more interesting since it adds a big number of bonuses to the original game. On the map, you can find presents containing bonuses, but the only problem is that you never know what you will find in it. You can find time pills, tail cut pills (reducing the size of the cobra), but also reverse pills (exchanging the head and the tail of the cobra) and slow down pills, speed up pills and control inversion pills. The goal is to eat all the pills of a level in the minimum amount of time without eating your tail of eating obstacles. You will play inside 30 different levels with 5 different environments. Use 2, 4, 8, 6 to control your cobra.

sample_screenshots.caption: Eat all the pills of the level as quickly as you can...
Game splashscreen
The arrow shows there is another part of the level on the right. Use the teleporter to go there (red cell on the right)
Don't forget to eat the gift, it contains a special bonus. The problem is that you don't know what is in...

title: Crazy Cobra 2

description: IF Racing is a formula one racing game. You will be one of the competitors of the formula one championship and will drive on the most famous circuits of the world. Beat all the opponents by finishing 1st to all the races, win points on each circuit. Beware the weather can change, use the appropriate wheels and settings. Be careful not to run out of fuel otherwise you will loose the grand prix. Use 4 and 6 to control your car, acceleration is automatic.

sample_screenshots.caption: Your car is almost destroyed, speed up and enter the pitstop to repair it. (Alcatel OT535 version)
The race starts, competitors are in front of you, you will have to be quicker than them. (Alcatel OT535 version)
Race description, you will learn a lot of things here. The weather is fine and the road is dry. (SagemMyX5 version)
Tires can have different characteristics. Use them accordingly to the weather. (SagemMyX5 version)
In the pitstop you can repair your car, fill the tank and change the tires if necessary. During the race, as elements become weaker, you will see icons on screen. (SagemMyX5 version)

title: IF Racing

description:
You control a ball within mazes that become increasingly complex. Your goal is to lead it from the starting to the end of the level avoiding traps, holes and enemies, taking keys and pressing buttons to open doors.

Sphere Madness is a Marble Madness variant with a top-down view. The game contains 40 levels set in four different graphic environments. Along your way, you will meet shops where you can buy bonuses and power-ups to ease your way to the end of each level.

sample_screenshots.caption: Take the key to open that door.
Arrows show you will pushed in a direction indicated by it.
You can catch the bonus (P) to win points. But beware of the enmies around you (pink blobs)
The blue blob will open a shop where you can buy a lot of bonuses
Transition screens are displayed each 10 levels

title: Sphere Madness

description: Sphere Madness 2 is the sequel of Sphere Madness. The sequel adds new things like the capability to turn your ball into a bubble that will be able to fly over holes but will explode by touching walls. This game is still a action/arcade game where your goal is to lead a ball inside levels without falling or being destroyed by enemies and collecting bonuses and points. Manage your life bar and never let it decrease to 0 otherwise you will die immediately. Do not forget to go inside shops to buy important bonuses and power-ups that will help you to finish the game. The game is composed of 25 levels within 3 graphic environments. The graphic artist changed to bring his own personal touch. You control the ball using 2, 4, 6, 8 (or the phone DPad).

sample_screenshots.caption: Do not let the energy bar (top left) decreasing to 0 or you will die.
The cell above fills your energy bar to the maximum. Do not hesitate to come back later if you can.
Game splashscreen
Take keys to open doors.
Press the green button to open the green door. Beware, behind the door, there are accelerator which will increase your speed in the direction they are showing.

title: Sphere Madness 2

description: Mutant Alert is a real time 1st person shooting game where you control a scientist in a lab that tries to escape from the creatures he created by mistake. The game is a 3D real time game where you control the camera with total freedom. You will be able to collect weapons, objects that will help you to survive and to escape along the 12 levels of this game. Use 4 and 6 (or DPad left and right) to turn, use, 2 (or up) to move ahead and 8 (or down) to go backwards. Use 5 to shoot.

sample_screenshots.caption: Here we are in the laboratory of the building
Game over page
Game splashscreen
The game takes place in 15 levels with 5 different environments.
Shoot this monster before he gets too close to you and hurt you.

title: Mutant Alert

description: 007 Ice Racer is a racing game based on the universe of "Die Another Day" Bond movie. You are chasing Zao and Jinx across Iceland with your special Aston Martin car to reach the Ice Palace and kill the villains. You have several weapons with you to damage enemy cars. The goal is like in Chase H.Q. to drive faster than the enemy and destroy his car before the time reaches 0 and before you run out of petrol.

sample_screenshots.caption: Sometimes you are fighting against the clock like here.
Catch this power up, it is a booster that will increase the speed of your car temporary
Or against you own fuel tank (bonuses during the journey will refill it). Here you need to destroy the car of Jinx.
Zao is in front of you, destroy his car.
In the lab of Q, you can buy special bonuses to help you. Better wheels, extra time, missiles...

title: 007 Ice Racer

description:
This game is based on the movie Star Wars: Episode III.

You will successively control Anakin, Obi-Wan, Mace Windu and Yoda across a 12 levels game taking place in various environments from the film (Trade Federation Cruiser, Kashyyyk, Mustafar, Utapau and Coruscant). You will face 10 types of enemies and 4 types of bosses including General Grievous, Count Dooku and the Emperor.

The game is a beat them all where you will have to destroy enemies in front of you to reach the end of the levels to either complete the task given to you (like escaping Kashyyyk using a ship) or defeat the boss at the end of the level.

You can use your light saber to kill enemies. After a certain number of victories against smaller enemies, your Force Gauge will increase and you will be able to use it to freeze enemies.

sample_screenshots.caption: Game splashscreen
Here you play Yoda on Kasheek. Jump from platforms to platforms to go ahead.
Here you play with Anakin. Kill the enemy robots before they use their gun
Here you play Mace Windoo. Like in the film he is going to Palpatine room to arrest him.

title: Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith

description: This game is a set of various winter sports games like Snowboarding, Ski jumping, Cross country skiing, Alpine Ski and Biathlon. Follow the instructions during each event by pressing correct buttons when progressing. For instance, for Cross-Country you will have to press 5 button when the speed gauge is reaching the maximum and regularly when the path is normal, press 2 when the path is going up and 8 when it is going down. For ski jumping, press 5 when the gauge is at the maximum before starting, then maintain the player in a correct position so he doesn't fall using 4 and 6. For snowboarding and alpine skiing, press 2 to speed up and use 4 and 6 to turn.

sample_screenshots.caption: Now maintain the player in a normal position using 4 and 6
Snowboard: blue flag, right, red flag, left, do not miss or you will loose some points
When playing biathlon, you will have to shoot the targets in a minimum amount of time but with accuracy
Main Menu
Game Splashscreen

title: Winter Sports

description: Be the most famous detective in the city of Chicago during the prohibition period and kill all the bandits to free the city from the crime. Chicago Guns is a very simple game where you only see 3 windows in front of you. Shoot the appropriate window when it opens but beware not to shoot innocent people. Use the keys 4, 5 and 6 to shoot left, middle or right windows. The game has 40 levels with bonus stage at level 5, 15, 25 and 35 + boss stages at stage 10, 20, 30 and 40. The game has also 4 different graphic environments.

sample_screenshots.caption: Bonus stage, shoot Yes targets and avoid No targets
Game title screen
There are a lot of different enemy types. They are more or less resistent.
Game splashscreen opens on an animated sequence
Here shoot right but don't shoot the innocent in the middle of the screen

title: Chicago Guns

description: Control a mouse in a maze full of cats trying to eat it. Crazy Pet 2 is a Pacman clone where the goal is to eat cheese pills. If you eat a big cheese pill, then the mouse will be able to eat the cats but beware, this power only lasts for a few seconds. The game contains 50 levels with 5 different environments. Use 4, 6, 2, 8 to move the mouse or use the navigation DPad.

sample_screenshots.caption: When you have no more lives, the cat will show his happy face.
Game splashscreen
Avoid the can and eat all the pills, that's the only way to survive.
When the cat is blue you can eat it. Beware it is not very long.
If you eat the big cheese on the top of the screen, then you will be able to eat the cats.

title: CrazyPet II

description: Panko is a game where you can control a panda or a koala that needs to put wood blocks on water holes. Each water hole must be covered by a wood block following the principle of the well known Sokoban game. But in this game there is much more. Sometimes the level takes place on ice and moving around becomes much harder. Use 4, 6, 2, 8 to move or the phone navigation d-pad. If a wood block is in front of you it will automatically be pushed one cell ahead of your movement.

sample_screenshots.caption: Some levels can be very tricky and can have only one ideal path to follow.
The time is very important too. If you run out of it, the game is lost.
And when it is lost, the characters will be crying.
If you do a single mistake, sometimes the situation will be unsolvable. In that case, use a joker to go 1 step back.
On ice, the hero can only run in the same direction until he have a wall or an object in front of it.

title: Panko

description: Celebrity Chic is a game with the goal of helping two girls to become celebrities. They will face dangerous situations in front of people already involved in show business. You will have to help them avoid stupid promises. You need to make good decisions by selecting right answers to the questions that are asked. According to each answer you earn more or less celebrity points. The goal is to collect the biggest number of points at the end to become famous.

sample_screenshots.caption: Game splashscreen
When a question is asked. Use 4 to agree hardly, 2 to agree with normal mood, 6 to refuse. Warning, this kind of decision will change the celebrity points you earn.
The game is a narative game with an evolved scenario. Help her to take good decisions.
Here is the girl you are going to help. Quest for fame is not a simple quest.

title: Celebrity Chic

description: I.F. Ski Jumping is a game where the goal is to become the most famous Ski jumper in the world and beat the biggest champions. You can play one of the 4 different characters with different skills and you will be taught how to jump by an old very famous jumper now retired. He will provide you all the help you need about technique so that you can upgrade your level during each jump. During each phase you will face a new opponent, each time more powerful. The game is pretty simple. Before jumping, control your stress by pressing the ok button when your power gauge reaches the maximum. Then control the player so that he stays on the track (with the keys left and right of the Dpad or 4 and 6). Then press fire at the right time, when the jumper reaches the end of the track. When in the air, control the balance of the player (disturbed by the wind) by pressing left and right, then press 5 to land. After a jump, you will earn points thanks to the distance you did.

sample_screenshots.caption: Here the balance is prefect, carry-on like this. There are 2 steps during the "in the air" phase with the same goal (keep the balance).
You can select your player within a list of 4 with different characteristics. Some are locked and you will have to unlock them.
Game Splashscreen
Last phase of the jump, press 5 when the player lands, here, you did it well.
When in the air, keep a good balance by pressing left and right. The goal is to have the small icon on the bottom of the screen as green as possible.

title: I.F. Ski Jumping

description: IF Extreme Ski is a Winter sport game where the goal is to make the most incredible figures to earn as many points as you can. You will face several opponents and will be taught by an old retired guru that will try to make create the champion of the champions. First you will have to jump and will have to follow each indication written on screen to create and link figures one after another. To do so, select a figure to accomplish by pressing 1 button, then follow the keys shown on screen to finish the figure. When the figure is finished you can either wait to prepare landing or carry on with a new figure. Beware not to take too many risks or you may finish your nose in the snow.

sample_screenshots.caption: And now 2 to finish it. Afterwards, you can either do an extra figure or wait until you land on the floor.
Previously to a jump, press 5 when the gauge is at the maximum to reach maximum speed while jumping.
Now maintain the skier on the track to ensure a good jump.
First you can play with one of the 4 heroes. Each hero has its own skill and weaknesses.
The follow the digits on the screen, press 5 to continue the figure

title: IF Extreme Ski

description: Pikubi 2: Rainbow Attack! is the sequel of Pikubi. You are controlling the same big "bubble gum" like bird trying to save the world from alien invasion. But now, Pikubi knows how to fly. This game is a Bubble Bobble like game where the goal is to knock down aliens falling from the sky. Those enemies are a bit special. When they join one with another, they glue themselves and create a new resulting bigger enemy that will require more than one hit to kill. So avoid them from meeting each others or your mission will become more risky. Platforms are placed all over the levels (creating paths for the enemies) and you can use them to climb and pick up bonuses that will fall during each level. Some of them only give points but a special one allow Pikubi to throw flames in front of him. The gameplay is very simple, use 4 and 6 to move left and right, 8 to jump and 5 to punch.

sample_screenshots.caption: If you eat a pimento, Pikubi will throw fire and destroy everything around him.
Game splashscreen
3rd level, punch the blocks above Pikubi and eat the cakes for bonus points. Beware some aliens may fall from the sky.
Between levels, Pikubi flies to reach upper skies.
In the early levels you are behind rock blocks. This will prevent you from being touched straight away by aliens. Once you punch those blocks, the action begins.

title: Pikubi 2: Rainbow Attack!

description: Fighter Pilot Evolved is a game where you are controlling a plane pushed into a black hole and sending it back to 1914 during World War I. The fighter is followed by old planes trying to shoot him. Avoid their weapons and kill them in order to go from one time period to another. To do so, empty the enemy kill gauge and kill the boss of each level. In the meantime, enemies will throw bonuses that will give you points, beware of catching them. This game is composed of 10 levels and you will face a lot of different enemies from old biplanes to future flying saucers. This game is a Time Pilot clone where you just have to shoot enemies. Use 4 and 6 to rotate your plane. The autofire is on, you have nothing else to do.

sample_screenshots.caption: In this 2nd time zone, there are some semi bosses that will give you some points. Shoot them several times to kill them.
Here is the big boss of the 3rd time zone. Perhaps using some bombs will be more efficient
You can buy bombs in the game. Use them to explode all small enemies on screen and to hurt bosses much more than a simple shot.
3rd step in time, the 2nd world war. Planes start to be more powerful.
Catch the box to get bonus points. Beware, sometimes planes will drop their pilot and you can get some bonus catching them too.

title: Fighter Pilot Evolved

description: Sexy Video Poker is a video poker packaged with a detective story. The jewels of a Miami old Lady, owner of a Cabaret, were stolen last night and a young detective is asked to come to solve the robbery. He will have to go into six locations to interview six women that will propose their information against a nice Video Poker. Each time those women have lost too much money they undress until they get naked. Each time you finish a previous location, the access to a new one is unlocked and the story can carry on until you find the thief.

sample_screenshots.caption: Game splashscreen. You will be a private investigator trying to solve a robbery. The jewels of an old lady were stolen.
During the story a lot of dialogs are displayed to explain what's going on.
Enf of game you will have a nice ending sequence.
4th level, it seems that the nieve of the old woman is involved in the story.
Select the place where you want to start your story. Warning, places get unlocked when you finish the previous level.

title: Sexy Video Poker

description: Malibu Ride 2 is a game where you will participate in powerboat races all over the world. The game is a top-view scrolling game. The gameplay is very simple: Control your boat using 4 and 6 to turn (the acceleration is automatic). You will compete against seven other opponents that you will have to overtake. Finish first each race and move to the next level. The game is composed of 10 races all over the world.

sample_screenshots.caption: At the start, wait for the lights to turn green and accelarate to the max. speed.
Overtake this opponent and rush for the 1st place
Game splashscreen

title: Malibu Ride 2

description:
SexyBreaker Manga is a Breakout variant in which you will travel around the world to play five levels per location to see an entire background image and collect those images into your gallery. There are a total of 35 levels dispatched in 7 locations.

The game largely sticks to the standard Breakout formula. Break the bricks and clear the level to reach the next level. When being broken, some bricks will drop some bonuses that will help you (or not) to finish the level more quickly. Catch those pills to activate the bonuses. Bonuses are:

  • Large pad

  • Little pad

  • Glue

  • Multiball

  • Rocket

  • 1up

  • Next level

  • Slow ball

sample_screenshots.caption: Clear this last level to finish the game.
You've activated the multiball, catch the S bonus (Slow down) to slow down the balls
Game splashscreen
You've catched the rocket bonus. Now your pad will fire rockets at bricks and destroy them.
You've catched the lareg pad bonus. Now it is easier to hit the ball.

title: SexyBreaker Manga

description: IF Ping Pong is a game where you will be playing a ping pong championship. Select your champion (in a list of 12 characters) according to his capabilities (strength, stamina, speed) and try to defeat all the new opponents the computer will put in front of you. The game is very simple to play. Press 4 (or left button) to hit the ball to the left, use 6 (or right button) to hit to ball to the right. Try to hit the ball faster and faster to annoy your opponent that will lob, they use the 2 (up button) to smash. As you win matches, and depending on how many points your opponent did, you will win some money that you will be able to spend in upgrades like shoes, new racket, training...

sample_screenshots.caption: During the game, the score is presented between the points. Score 11 points to win the match
This is the game splashscreen. Your goal will be to win the cup and be champion
Select one of the 12 different characters. Beware because depending on their characteristics they will react differently
The game is very simple. The racket is moving automatically. Just press left or right at the right time to throw the ball on the other side of the table. Use up to smash.

title: IF Ping Pong

description:
Monkey Business is a puzzle game where you will have to help three little monkeys to collect as many bananas as they can. You will be working for Banana corps to collect the bananas that will be sent all over the world. At the beginning of each level, yellow, orange, pink, green, blue and red coin will be placed all over the gameplay area and you will have to clear it up using new coins that monkeys will drop from the top of the screen. The goal is to make lines of four or more of the same color coins so they transform themselves into bananas that will automatically be collected. Some special objects can also be placed in the level since the beginning and will disturb you during the game. For instance:

* Bananas can match with whatever you want.

* Rocks that will match with nothing.

* Wood blocks that will get destroyed when destroying coins around.

* Crystals will turn all the close coin to the color of the crystal.

* Multicolor coins will match with every possible color.

To move you will use the 4 and 6 button (left and right) and you will use the 2 and 8 (up and down) buttons to turn the current coin pattern about to be dropped. When your selection is made, drop the coins using 5 button.

sample_screenshots.caption: Select one of the 3 character to play with. Depending on the character the game will not be 100% the same
After you've done a line, you will collect bananas required by the boss to finish the level
Here is the game main board. Now succeed in aligning 4 or more coins of the same color to receive bananas
Now select your background. you will have to finish all those graphical environments
Game main menu, select play to start and select the game mode (tutorial, tournament, adventure or multiplayer)

title: Monkey Business

description:
IF Reversi is a game that tends to bring some educational things in the gameplay.

You will go through 12 difficulties of gameplay through the ancient ages from the Neanderthal period to ours facing some famous characters like Julius Cesar, Joan of Arc, and Einstein. You will therefore play against each of those character and will earn points depending on the time you spend to defeat them and the number of cells you own at the end of the level. Once you've defeated your current opponent, the next level is unlocked and you can progress in your adventure and reach an age closer to ours.

Along with the adventure mode, you will be able to play 2 other game modes:

  • Quick-game that will allow you to face any already faced opponent.
  • Challenge mode where you will be able to play one of the 4 difficulty level in 16 pre-generated maps in which you will have to win a specific match.

Along with this mode you will have a totally random mode that will allow you to play in random situations with a randomly filled board. The goal will still be to defeat the opponent by having more cells than him at the end of the game.

sample_screenshots.caption: After the Neanderthal age, face the Monkey. This one wills till be easy to defeat
The insane mode will be played faced to faced with the InFusio character
The title of the game
In this game mode you will be facing Neanderthal for the easy difficulty, Jules Cesar for the normal difficulty and Francois 1er for the hard mode.
You will face a game over if you do not own more cells than your opponent at the end of the game

title: IF Reversi

description: Crash Bandicoot is a mobile iteration of the Crash Bandicoot franchise. Crash has all his traditional moves such as spinning, jumping, crawling and belly-flopping. The game spans eighteen levels split into four worlds of different aesthetics. The player must collect Wumpa fruit and two hidden jewels from each level whilst avoiding obstacles such as bottomless pits or TNT crates.
title: Crash Bandicoot

description:
In Spyro, the titular character is a special guest at the Fairy Queen's Royal Ball. He needs to give each fairy their dress for the party in the right order to ensure that it is not cancelled.

The game has two modes:

  • Classic Mode: featuring three tutorial levels and fifteen standard levels.
  • Arcade Mode: an unlimited game mode where the fairies are more impatient and likely to cancel. Two cancellations mean game over.
title: Spyro
